data.name: Stir Trek
data.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: Adulting.Dev
relatedRecords.description: Adulting.Dev is a one day conference for professionals developers who have recently started their careers and the managers and team leads who support them. relatedRecords.name: Sensu Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: Sensu Summit 2019 is happening September 9-10 in Portland, OR. Join us for two days of technical talks, workshops, and all the #monitoringlove.
